fdaDrugLabel.indication: Uses temporarily relieves: minor irritations of the mouth minor pain in the mouth sore mouth sore throat first aid to help prevent skin infection in minor cuts, scrapes, and burns

nciThesaurus.definition: A substituted phenol with bactericidal, antihelminthic and potential antineoplastic activities. Hexylresorcinol is used as an antiseptic in mouthwashes and skin wound cleansers. Hexylresorcinol may also inhibit oxidative DNA damage by enhancing the activity of antioxidant enzymes, including glutathione peroxidase and glutathione reductase, which facilitate scavenging reactive oxygen molecules by glutathione (GSH).
